channel.title: How do i report a server on the top list
channel.description: this server has scammed money from players paying for items "not a donation" you pay for the items i was scammed i got proof i want the server taken off the toplist also my friend was scammed for 200$ he also has proof

item.title: How do i report a server on the top list
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Trebel:

Mopar said he wont change anything on anyones toplist what so ever…

He said he wouldn’t change their uptime. There are certain rules on Sponsored Servers and the Server Status Page, anything in breach of them can and will be edited by Moparisthebest.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i report a server on the top list

item.title: How do i report a server on the top list
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If theyre scamming, or selling thing (which is against the rules for the top list ) then it shouldnt be a problem

Read full topic
item.source: How do i report a server on the top list

item.title: How do i report a server on the top list
item.dc:creator: @Trebel Trebel
item.description:
@Trebel wrote:

zyle1992:

You should probably contact an admin, and give them every piece of proof you can find. Although, you cant really do a whole lot about the money. If it was through paypal, you could open a dispute, but they dont like dealing in virtual items, because its not only hard to prove, but hard to handle ‘oh, i just forgot to give it to him’ type thing.

Mopar said he wont change anything on anyones toplist what so ever…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i report a server on the top list
